summary: This bill, the Fighting Inhumane Gambling and High-risk Trafficking Act of 2025 (FIGHT Act), amends the Animal Welfare Act. It defines "rooster", prohibits gambling on animal fighting ventures, restricts the use of the Postal Service to transport roosters, and introduces civil citizen suits against those violating the act, potentially with fines. It also outlines seizure of property used for violations and makes technical corrections to existing law regarding conflicts with state law.
